heading: Thursday Night
text: Areas of freezing fog and increasing clouds.

heading: Friday
text: Rising chance of morning rain in New York, spreading south and east midday and afternoon.

heading: Saturday
text: Chance of late-day wintry mix or rain in the south
temperature: Low to mid 30s north, and mid 30s to lower 40s in the south

heading: Sunday
text: Wintry mix, maybe some valley rain at times.
temperature: Mid 30s to around 40, some lower 30s far north
